casebody.data:
[No. 43250] C. W. BLAKESLEE & SONS, INC., AND BLAKESLEE-ROLLINS CORPORATION v. THE UNITED STATES [89 C. Cls. 226;

309 U. S. —]

Government contract; knowledge of conditions. Decided May 1, 1939; petition dismissed. Plaintiffs’ motion for new trial overruled October 2, 1939.

Petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme* -Court February 5, 1940.
